sense.gloss: to rise (of water levels), to flow in
to be felt (i.e. as an emotion), to come over one
to hold up (an umbrella, etc.), to put up, to raise
to extend one's arm straight ahead (in dance)
to wear (a sword) in one's belt, to wear at one's side, to carry under one's arm
to insert one's arm under an opponent's arm
to pour, to add (liquid), to serve (drinks)
to put on (lipstick, etc.), to apply, to colour, to dye
to shut, to close, to lock, to fasten
to stop in the midst of, to leave undone

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑指|差↑↓ゆびさ↓す|のは↑無作法↑↓ぶさほう↓だ。
sdata.e: It is bad manners to point at people.

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓を↑指|差↑↓ゆびさ↓す|のは↑失礼↑↓しつれい↓なことです。
sdata.e: It's not polite to point at others.

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓を↑指|差↑↓ゆびさ↓す|のは↑失礼↑↓しつれい↓なことです。
sdata.e: It is not polite to point at others.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓がばかげた↑発言↑↓はつげん↓して↑水↑↓みず↓を|↑差↑↓さ↓す|までは、↑会議↑↓かいぎ↓はスムーズに↑進↑↓すす↓んでいた。
sdata.e: The meeting was going off without a hitch until he threw a wet blanket on it by making silly remarks.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑言動↑↓げんどう↓には↑嫌気↑↓いやけ↓が|↑差↑↓さ↓す|。
ほお↑紅↑↓べに↓や↑口紅↑↓くちべに↓を|↑差↑↓さ↓す|だけで↑表情↑↓ひょうじょう↓や↑笑顔↑↓えがお↓がどんどん↑変↑↓か↓わってくるんです。
sdata.e: Expressions and smiles change like that just from applying rouge and lipstick.

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓を↑指|差↑↓ゆびさ↓す|のは↑失礼↑↓しつれい↓なことです。
sdata.e: It isn't polite to point at others.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑指|差↑↓ゆびさ↓す|のは↑失礼↑↓しつれい↓だよ。
sdata.e: It's not polite to point at others.

sdata.j: ↑指↑↓ゆび↓を|↑差↑↓さ↓す|のは↑失礼↑↓しつれい↓だと、↑母↑↓はは↓から↑教↑↓おそ↓わりました。
sdata.e: My mother taught me that it's not polite to point.
